mechanics.outcome: Player Character gains the Ability Score Improvement feature

mechanics.trigger: Applying the Ability Score Improvement feature
mechanics.condition: Player chooses to increase one ability score

mechanics.trigger: Applying the Ability Score Improvement feature
mechanics.condition: Player chooses to increase two ability scores
mechanics.outcome: Two selected ability scores each increase by 1

mechanics.trigger: Attempting to increase an ability score
mechanics.outcome: Ability score cannot be increased above 20 using this feature

description_text: When you reach 4th level, and again at 8th, 12th, 16th, and 19th level, you can increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or you can increase two ability scores of your choice by 1. As normal, you can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.
